| HistoryText             = The Piranhas were a group of three mindless man-fish-eating machines that formed part of [[Namor McKenzie (Earth-616)|King Namor]]'s [[Defenders of the Deep (Earth-616)|Defenders of the Deep]][[Category:Defenders of the Deep (Earth-616)/Members]], a team established to accommodate to his new his new policies regarding relationships between the ocean and the surface world. Namor declared the oceans off-limits to all but their native inhabitants, and used the Defenders of the Deep to drive off any human presence on the ocean.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 9}}

After tearing down [[Russia|Russian]] submarines in the [[Black Sea]], the Defenders of the Deep attacked the international undersea research station [[Hydropolis]]. They were intercepted by the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]], and a fight broke out after the heroes attacked Piranhas to stop them from eating two bystanders despite Namor ordering them to stand down. Before the Defenders of the Deep retreated, the Piranhas tried once again to eat two innocent people. Namor intervened, punching two of the three Piranhas in the chest and killing them.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 10}}
